resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: TiAPI: Review and clean up platform bugs and reduce bug count by 20%.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
{html}

ipod touch 4gt 4.2.1, [INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/24/11 08:14 e1cb22a) similar bug in 1.5.1, no regression tag

1.Phone > camera > video record
2.Tap "start video" then immediately tap "stop video"

results: camera animates shutter close, then stays on that screen (shutter closed). Backgrounding the app, then relaunching will recover the app, but with some redraw issues.

also seeing: Thu Jan 27 11:17:01 unknown KitchenSink[1881] : [Warning] IORegisterForSystemPower failed

1.5.1 also fails but with a different error - deny iokit-open RootDomainUserClient

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: Quickly starting and stopping video recording hangs app and generates "deny iokit-open RootDomainUserClient" errors

comments.body: Tested on an iPhone 3GS using TiSDK 2.2.0v20120828153312, unable to reproduce the issue. Ticket marked as resolved.
Closing ticket as the issue cannot be reproduced.
